title: Judge Light Skin Tone
description: A person depicted as a judge, wearing a robe and holding scales of justice, with a light skin tone. This emoji represents fairness, justice, law, and making decisions.
apple_vendor_description: The judge emoji on Apple devices presents a distinguished figure with a stern yet fair expression, crafted with Apple's characteristic realistic lighting and smooth shading. Wearing a black robe and holding a gavel, this emoji embodies justice, authority, and impartiality, its details meticulously rendered with soft, rounded edges. This representation on Apple devices is commonly used in discussions about law, fairness, or making a decisive judgment.
